content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze how industrialization and imperialism contributed to the development of consumer culture in the period 1850–1914.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze how industrialization and imperialism contributed to the development of consumer culture in the period 1850–1914.

topic.text: 6.3: Second Wave Industrialization and Its Effects

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
